title: A Dear Friend
description:
Search the path deck and discard for a human and put them into play with this card attached.
Response: When the attached human is cleared, move the progress from it to any number of other beings, divided as you choose.

title: A Deeper Understanding
description: Choose a being. Move progress from the chosen being to each other card in play, up to 1 progress per card.

title: A Gentle Nudge
description: Each Ranger may discard 1 progress from a being within reach of them to move that being.

title: A Leaf in the Breeze
description: Response: When you Traverse, dodge up to 3 cards.

title: A Perfect Day
description: Refresh: Discard 1 cloud from this card. If there are no clouds remaining, flip this card.
mountaineffect: If this test added progress, add 1 additional progress.

title: A Stone in the River
description: Response: After you succeed at an Avoid test, exhaust 1 additional being.

title: A Trick of the Light
description: Clear progress: Read 39
suneffect: If there is an odd number of progress on this feature, the strange phenomenon vanishes. >> Shuffle it into the path deck.

title: Accommodation
description:
You’ve agreed to help Spiritspeaker Nal investigate the Caustic Mulcher’s purpose in the ecosystem.
Explore the woodlands of the Valley, where Caustic Mulchers can be found.
When a ranger token is removed from a Caustic Mulcher, place it on this card. It cannot be moved from here by the Mulcher’s effects.
At any point, the group can choose to change their mind and help Kordo instead. If they do, remove all ranger tokens from this card and flip it. Replace Accommodation with Intervention on the campaign tracker.
objective: Have all ranger tokens on this card: Read 1.40

title: Adaptable Multitool
description: Exhaust (use 1 charge): Spend 1 energy to gain 1 energy of any type.

title: Adherent of the First Ideal
description: Exhaust: Scout 1 challenge card.

title: Afforded by Nature
description: Discard any number of progress from a trail to add an equal number of harm to a being.

title: Agitated Meadowlarks
description:
SPI + Connection: Listen for the meadowlark’s song of warning to move your ranger token to this being.
Response: Before a being moves or enters play within reach, you may remove your ranger token from this prey to exhaust that being.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Ancestor's Grove
suneffect: Choose a card from your ranger discard. Place it on top of your fatigue stack.

title: Ancestral Teachings
description: Exhaust a being. Then add progress to that being equal to the number of exhausted beings within reach.

title: Ar Tel, Angler
description:
Friendly.
FOC + Conflict: Fish [2] with the affable angler to exhaust Ar Tel. If there is a water card in play, soothe 2 fatigue, and add 1 token to each equipped food.
Clear progress or harm: Read 48
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Ar Tel's Vaulting Rod
description:
Exhaust (use 1 vault): Exhaust an obstacle.
Response: When there are no vaults on this gear, discard it.
AWA + Conflict: Fish [2] if there is a water card in play to soothe 2 fatigue and add 2 progress to a water card.

title: Arcology Archaeology
description:
Silaro Mako has asked you to keep an eye out for remnants of the old arcology for him.
After a ruin is cleared: Read 1.49
objective: After this mission has 3 check marks, find Silaro Mako to continue.

title: Arcology Sinkhole
description:
AWA + Exploration: Explore [2] the labyrinthine underground structure to move your ranger token to this feature.
Clear progress: If a ranger token is on this feature, delve deeper into the arcology. Read 78
mountaineffect: The sinkhole widens. Discard 1 progress from a feature. If you cannot, this card fatigues you.

title: Atrox Mountain
description: FIT + Reason: Climb the steep and perilous route to add 2 progress to this location for every effort. Then, it fatigues you.

title: Balanced
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue to gain 1 energy of any type.

title: Ben Amon, Swift Pilot
description:
Friendly.
FOC + Connection: Convince [3] Ben of the urgency of your mission to move your ranger token to this being.
Clear harm or progress: Read 87
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Boulder Field
description: Reduce the presence of all beings in play by 1.

title: Boundary Sensor
description: Exhaust (use 1 sensor): When a Ranger performs a Traverse test, commit 1 effort.

title: Breathe Into It
description: Response: When you perform a test, discard any number of cards from your fatigue stack to commit 1 effort to that test for every 2 cards discarded this way.

title: Calming Presence
description:
Attach to a predator.
Attached card loses the predator trait.
Response: Before a challenge effect on the attached card would resolve, you may discard 2 progress from it to cancel the effect.

title: Calypsa, Ranger Mentor
description:
Friendly.
Clear progress or harm: Read 85
mountaineffect: Add 1 progress to a path card as Calypsa lends you a hand.
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Camoweave Cloak
description: Use 1 charge: When you would suffer 1 or more fatigue from a path card, reduce the fatigue suffered to 0.

title: Carbonforged Cable
description:
Attach to a predator.
Use 1 length: When the attached predator would ready, it remains exhausted.
FIT + Conflict: Lead the animal to move the attached predator.

title: Carbonforged Trowel
description:
SPI + Reason: Tend to the local plants to add or remove harm from a flora equal to your effort.
FIT + Conflict: Strike [2] out with your gardening tool to add 1 harm to a being for every 2 effort. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.

title: Carnivorous Naiad
description:
You cannot remove your ranger token except with the following test:
FIT + Conflict: Pull [2] yourself free of the constricting lake weed to add harm to this feature equal to your FIT aspect and remove your ranger token from this feature.
suneffect: The Ranger with the most fatigue must discard 1 AWA or move their ranger token to this feature.
cresteffect: If your ranger token is on a water feature, the Naiad stabs you with its teeth. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Caustic Mulcher
description:
Beings attached to this being do not ready.
If a ranger token is on this biomeld, you cannot travel and ranger tokens on this biomeld cannot be moved except by this test:
FIT + Conflict: Wrest [2] them free of the mulcher’s grasp to exhaust this biomeld, then remove a ranger token or unattach a being from it. If you unattach a being, place it in the same area as this biomeld.
suneffect: If there is another active being, exhaust it and attach it to this biomeld. If not, move your ranger token to this biomeld.
cresteffect: Add 1 harm to each being attached to this biomeld. Each Ranger with their ranger token on this biomeld suffers 1 injury.

title: Circling Irix
description:
Persistent.
SPI + Conflict: Scare [2] off the loitering carrion-eater to place this being on top of the path deck. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.
suneffect: If this being is along the way, move it within reach. >> It fatigues you.
cresteffect: If this being is within reach, and you have 3 or more fatigue, exhaust it. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Cloudhive
description: Response: After adding 1 or more harm to this feature, add 1 bee to each Cloudhive Swarm in play.
suneffect: If there are no Cloudhive Swarms in play. >> Search the path discard and deck for the next Cloudhive Swarm.
mountaineffect: If there is an active mammal, exhaust it. >> Add progress to it and harm to this feature, both equal to the mammal’s presence.

title: Cloudhive Swarm
description:
Refresh: Add 1 bee to this swarm.
You can add a maximum of 1 harm per test to this swarm.
X is equal to the number of bees on this swarm.
cresteffect: If X is greater than or equal to your FIT aspect, exhaust this swarm. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Confront
description:
You’ve found the mega-predator! Now it’s time to deal with it once and for all.
When the subject of this mission is cleared, resolve the following effects instead:
objective:
Clear harm: Permanently kill the majestic mega-predator. Read 1.44
Clear progress: Befriend and calm the beast so it is no longer an issue. Read 1.43
suneffect: If the predator has 2R or more progress, resolve its Crest effect.
mountaineffect: If the predator has 3R or more harm, move it.

title: Cradled by the Earth
description: Choose a trail. Soothe fatigue equal to the number of progress on that trail. This fatigue may be divided as you choose between all Rangers.

title: Dayhowler
description:
Discard this gear from play to exhaust beings equal to the number of charges on this gear.
Response: After you succeed at an Avoid test, add 1 charge to this gear.

title: Determined
description: The number of Exploration on this attribute is equal to the number of FIT in your energy pool.

title: Dolewood Canopy
description:
While your ranger token is on this feature, treat each card within reach as exhausted, but you cannot add progress to features or the location.
FIT + Reason: Climb [2] the towering trees to get your bearings to either move your ranger token to this feature or remove it from this feature. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.
suneffect: A Ranger may remove their ranger token from this feature.

title: Downpour
suneffect: Discard 1 rain from this card. >> Each ranger suffers 1 fatigue. If there is no rain remaining, flip this card.

title: Dozing Bearsloth
suneffect: If there is flora along the way, the bearsloth goes in search of food. >> Move this being along the way.
mountaineffect: If this predator is along the way, you feel a large presence looming over you. >> Suffer 1 fatigue.
cresteffect: If you have 4 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. >> Suffer 1 injury and move this being within reach.

title: Eagle Eye
description: Scout 3 path cards, then draw 1 path card.

title: Elder Murtok Gral
description:
Friendly.
FOC + Reason: Listen [3] to the wisdom of the elders to return a moment from your hand to your collection to choose a starting moment from your collection that you meet the aspect requirement for and add it to your hand. (This alteration to your deck is permanent.)
Clear progress or harm: Read 51
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Energized Hiking Greaves
description: Use X buffers: When you perform a test, suffer X fewer fatigue from each card between you and the card with which you are interacting.

title: Engaging
description: The number of Connection on this attribute is equal to the number of SPI in your energy pool.

title: Exceptional Tinkerer
description: Exhaust: Spend 1 energy to add 1 token to a tech.

title: Familiar Ground
description: Add 1 harm to a flora to add 3 progress to a trail.

title: Favorite Gear
description:
Attach to one of your equipped gear.
Response: After you use a token from the attached gear, soothe 1 fatigue.

title: Ferinodex
description: Exhaust (use 1 profile): When a Ranger performs an Avoid test, commit 1 effort.

title: Field Journal
description:
Response: When you rest, add entries equal to the number of FOC in your energy pool.
Use 1 entry: When a Ranger interacts with a feature, commit 1 effort.

title: Follow in Footsteps
description: Response: After you succeed at a Connect test, add progress to a feature equal to your effort. This is in addition to the test’s standard effect.

title: Fractalwire
description:
Obstacle.
FOC + Conflict: Break [2] the bladed coils to add 1 harm to this feature for every 2 effort. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.
mountaineffect: Add 1 harm to each being within reach.

title: Fresh Blue Kelpweed
description: FOC + Reason: Wrap [2] the pungent leaves around a wound to add 1 harm to this feature and either heal 1 injury from a Ranger, or discard 2 harm from a being.
mountaineffect: If there is a Romping Lutrinal within reach, it escapes through the weeds. >> Move it along the way.

title: Fresh Sitka Carcass
description: AWA + Connection: Watch [2] for opportunistic carnivores to move your ranger token to this feature.
suneffect: If your ranger token is not on this feature, exhaust this feature. >> Search the path deck for the next predator and put it into play.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this feature equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Functional Replica
description: Exhaust (use 1 charge): Choose a Ranger’s equipped gear. Resolve the chosen gear’s effect as if you had used a token from it and/or exhausted it.

title: Gathering Storm
description:
FOC + Reason: Shelter [2] from the threatening clouds overhead to discard 1 rain from this card for every 2 effort.
Refresh: Add 2 rain to this card. If there are 4 or more rain tokens, a peal of thunder fills the air, and a heavy rain begins. Move all prey along the way. Then, each ranger exhausts their role. Flip this card.

title: Gauzeblade
description: FIT + Conflict (use 1 fiber): Slice [X] with the fibrous blade to add harm to a being equal to your effort. If you fail, suffer 1 injury. X is equal to the being’s presence.

title: Golden Shore
description: SPI + Reason: Contemplate [2] the rhythmic waves as they lap the glittering shoreline to soothe 1 fatigue for every 2 effort.

title: Green Thumb
description:
Search the path deck and discard for a flora and put it into play with this skill attached.
Increase the attached flora’s harm threshold by 2.

title: Guardian
description: Exhaust: Reduce a being’s presence to 0 until the end of your turn.

title: Hanging Cherry Moss
description: FIT + Reason: Climb up to reach the sweetest of the insect-luring fruit to add 1 harm to this feature, discard 1 token from an insect in play, and soothe 1 fatigue.
suneffect: If there is an insect in play, exhaust this feature. >> Ready an insect.
mountaineffect: If there is an active mammal, exhaust it. >> Add progress to it and harm to this feature, both equal to that mammal’s presence.

title: Hanging Gardens
description: AWA + Reason: Eat the abundant fruits to add 1 harm to this feature, soothe 3 fatigue, and heal 1 injury.
mountaineffect: If there is an active human, exhaust them. >> Add progress to them and harm to this feature, both equal to their presence.

title: Harmonize
description:
Manifestation.
Attach to a being within reach of any Ranger.
Response: After a challenge effect on the attached being resolves, the Ranger that played this card gains 1 energy of any type.

title: Healing Touch
description:
Choose one:
Discard 1 harm from a being to add 3 progress to it.
Heal 1 injury from a Ranger.

title: Helping Hand
description:
You have agreed to help this person with a task around the Valley.
Do not add this mission to the campaign tracker. If you do not help this person before the end of the day, the opportunity is lost for now.
The attached being gains Persistent.

title: Hidden Trail
description:
Response: When you travel, if this trail is attached to the location, travel to a location up to two paths away. Use the terrain of the second path when building the path deck.
Clear progress: Attach this trail to the location.

title: Homeward Bound
description: Move all progress from a being to a feature.

title: Hy Pimpot, Chef
description:
Friendly.
AWA + Reason: Harvest [2] local plants for the stew to attach a flora facedown to Hy. If there are 3 flora attached to Hy, he prepares his famous stew: Read 47.4
Clear progress or harm: Read 47
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Hy Pimpot's Secret Recipe
description: Add 1 harm to each flora. Add X progress to each being. Then each Ranger soothes X fatigue. X is equal to the total number of harm added by this card.

title: Hydrolens Goggles
description: AWA + Reason (use 1 drop): Clarify your view of the environment around you to scout path cards equal to your effort, then draw 1 path card.

title: Infusion Canteen
description:
When you play this gear, choose an aspect (you may place a spare energy token here as a reminder).
Exhaust (use 1 sip): Gain 1 energy matching the chosen aspect.

title: Insightful
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue to add it back into your hand.

title: Intention Translator
description: Exhaust (use 1 charge): When a Ranger performs a Connect test, commit 1 effort.

title: Intervention
description:
You’ve agreed to help Kordo remove the unnatural biomeld Caustic Mulcher from the ecosystem.
Explore the woodlands of the Valley, where Caustic Mulchers can be found.
At any point, the group can choose to change their mind and help Nal instead. If they do, flip this card. Replace Intervention with Accommodation on the campaign tracker.
objective: Clear a Caustic Mulcher with harm: Read 1.41

title: Inventive
description: The number of Reason on this attribute is equal to the number of FOC in your energy pool.

title: Ironwool Boots
description:
Unique.
Response: After you play a moment, soothe 1 fatigue.

title: Journey
description: You have to venture to a different location for the next step in your journey.
objective: Arrive at the attached location: Read 1.50

title: Kleptic Raccoon
description:
AWA + Connection: Keep one eye on the raccoon and the other on the path to exhaust this being and add progress to it equal to your effort. If you fail, draw a path card.
Clear progress: Search your Ranger discard for a gear and add it to your hand.
suneffect: Discard an equipped gear. >> Add 1 loot to this being. If there are 2 or more loot on this being, shuffle it into the path deck.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Kobo's Market
description: FOC + Connection: Haggle [3] with the vendors of the market to return a gear from your hand to your collection. Choose a starting gear from your collection that you meet the aspect requirement for and add it to your hand. (This alteration to your deck is permanent.)

title: Kordo, Ranger Veteran
description:
Friendly.
FIT + Conflict: Hunt [2] with Kordo to add 1 harm to a being for every 2 effort. Then add an equal amount of progress to Kordo.
Clear progress or harm: Read 44
cresteffect: If there are 2 or more active predators, exhaust 1 of them. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Kordo's Instinct
description: Search the path deck for a card and place it on the top or bottom of the deck.

title: Lingering Injury
description:
Fatiguing 2
Response: When you draw this card, attach it to your role.
FIT + Reason: Treat [2] and bandage the injury to return this card to your collection.

title: Local Fare
description: Response: When a Ranger performs a test, they may add 1 harm to a flora to dodge each being in the same area as that flora.

title: Lone Tree Station
description: AWA + Connection: Search beneath the comforting shade of your Giga-Redwood home to scout path cards equal to your effort, then draw 1 path card.

title: Loose-leaf Tea Kit
description:
Response: After you add 1 or more harm to a flora, you may add 1 herb to this gear.
Exhaust (use 1 herb): Choose a Ranger. That Ranger gains 1 energy of any type.

title: Lunn, Outpost Tender
description:
Friendly.
Clear progress or harm: Read 41
suneffect: If Northern Outpost is the current location, Lunn begrudgingly gets to work. >> Discard 1 neglect from the location.
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Lure
description:
Locate one of the local mega-predators by finding prey to lure it out.
When a prey is cleared, set it aside.
objective: Arrive at a new location while there is 5 or more total presence of prey set aside: Read 1.42
cresteffect: If there are 2 active predators, exhaust them. >> Return 1 set-aside prey to the collection.

title: Lutrinal Holt
description:
FOC + Connection: Coax [2] the lutrinals back to their lair to add 1 lure to this feature. You may discard 1 token from an equipped food to commit 1 effort.
Clear progress: Shuffle a Romping Lutrinal into the path deck for each lure on this feature.
mountaineffect: Exhaust this feature. >> Search the path deck and discard for a Romping Lutrinal and put it into play.

title: Masterful Engineer
description: Exhaust: Ready a tech.

title: Masterwork
description:
Attach to a Ranger’s equipped gear.
Response: When a Ranger performs a test from the attached gear, commit 1 effort.

title: Meditation Pillow
description: FOC + Connection (use 1 session): Meditate on your journey to shuffle a number of cards from your fatigue stack into your Ranger deck equal to your effort.

title: Memlev Trekking Poles
description: Exhaust (use 1 charge): When you perform a Traverse test, use FOC instead of FIT.

title: Memorill Sketchpad
description:
Response: After a path card is cleared, add 1 inkrill to this gear.
Use 1 inkrill: When a Ranger interacts with a feature, commit 1 effort.

title: Meticulous
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue to add it back into your hand.

title: Midday Sun
description:
Refresh: Add 1 cloud to this card. If there are 3 or more clouds, flip this card.
FOC + Reason: Locate [2] shade to wait out the blaring sun to add 1 cloud to this card and soothe 1 fatigue.
suneffect: Suffer 1 fatigue.

title: Moment of Desperation
description: Discard one of your equipped gear to add Harm to a being equal to the number of tokens on the discarded gear.

title: Mount Nim
description: FOC + Exploration: Overlook [3] the surrounding valley to choose a nearby location. Attach 1 card from that location’s set facedown to this location. After you travel, if you traveled to that location, put the attached card into play. Otherwise, return it to the collection.

title: Nal's Understanding
description: Add 5 progress to a being. Then, if the being hasn’t cleared, resolve each of its challenge effects in an order of your choice. Resolve these effects even if the being is exhausted.

title: Nature's Abundance
description: Each Ranger may add 1 harm to a flora to soothe 1 fatigue and gain 1 energy of any type. When you add harm to a flora in this way, you may not exceed its harm threshold.

title: Nidocyte Sentinel
description:
Attach to a being.
Use 1 alarm: When a challenge effect on the attached being would resolve, cancel that effect.

title: Northern Outpost
description:
FOC + Reason: Tidy the remote outpost to discard 1 neglect from this location. If you fail, it fatigues you.
When there is no neglect on this location: Read 4.1

title: Novice Lens
description:
Response: After you perform a test in which you commited 1 or more manifestation, gain 1 FOC.
Response: When you rest, if you have 1 or more FOC in your energy pool, scout 1 challenge card.

title: One Eye Open
description: Response: When you rest, exhaust up to one being for each AWA in your energy pool.

title: One With Nature
description: Reduce the presence of each card in play to 0 until the end of the next turn.

title: Orlin Hiking Stave
description:
Exhaust (use 1 stride): Add 1 progress to a trail.
FIT + Conflict: Strike [2] out with your walking implement to add 1 harm to a being for every 2 effort. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.

title: Orlin Thumper
description: FIT + Conflict (use 1 pulse): Strike [2] with a pulse of kinetic energy to add 1 harm to a being and exhaust it. If you fail, discard 1 progress from that being; if you cannot, it fatigues you instead.

title: Oru the Sheep Dog
description:
Friendly. Persistent. Unique.
Exhaust: Move a being and add 2 progress to it.
FIT + Connection: Pet your canine companion to ready this being and soothe 1 fatigue.

title: Oura Vos, Traveler
description:
Friendly.
FOC + Exploration: Ask [3] Oura who she has encountered during her travels to search the Valley set for a human and shuffle them into the path deck.
Clear progress or harm: Read 81
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Overgrown Thicket
description:
Obstacle.
AWA + Exploration: Hunt for a way through the dense foliage to add progress to this feature equal to your effort.
mountaineffect: Discard 1 progress from this feature. >> It fatigues you.

title: Paratrepsis Whistle
description: Exhaust (use 1 call): When a Ranger would suffer an injury from a predator or harm would be added to a being by a predator, cancel that effect.

title: Passionate
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue to add it back into your hand.

title: Paths We've Roamed Before
description: Choose up to 4 total moments or attributes from any number of Ranger discards. Place the chosen cards facedown on the top of their Ranger’s fatigue stack.

title: Peerless Pathfinder
description: Exhaust: Move your ranger token to a feature. That feature fatigues you.

title: Perceptive
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, gain 1 AWA.

title: Perfect Recall
description:
Play a moment from your discard pile without paying its energy cost (X is equal to the chosen moment’s cost).
This card can be played at the time specified on the chosen moment.

title: Persuasive
description: After you succeed at a test in which you committed this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue to add it back into your hand.

title: Phonoscopic Headset
description: Exhaust: When a Ranger scouts, increase the number of cards scouted by 1.

title: Pocketed Belt Pouch
description:
Reduce the equip value of your gear by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
AWA + Reason (use 1 pocket): Open your belt pouch and reach inside to search your Ranger deck for a gear and add it to your hand.

title: Pokodo the Ferret
description:
Friendly. Persistent. Unique.
Exhaust: Discard 1 progress from this being to add 1 token to an Aid card and 2 progress to another being.

title: Pouncing Atrox
description: Ambush.
suneffect: If there is another active predator, the atrox pounces. >> Add 2 harm to that predator and 1 harm to this being.
cresteffect: If you have 2 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Prodigy of the Floating Tower
description: Exhaust: Choose a manifestation in your discard, and add it to your hand.

title: Prowling Wolhund
description: If there is another predator in play, this predator comes into play exhausted.
suneffect: Ready another Prowling Wolhund.
cresteffect: If you have 3 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Puffercrawler
description:
If this being is attached to a role or a being with persistent, it gains Persistent.
FOC + Conflict: Peel [2] away the soporific tendrils to add harm to this being equal to your effort. If you fail, attach it to your role.
suneffect: If this biomeld is attached to a being, add 1 harm to that being. If it is not attached, attach it to a being of your choice.
cresteffect: If this being is attached to your role, suffer 1 injury. If it is not attached, attach it to your role.

title: Puffercrawler Spores
description:
Attach to any Ranger’s equipped gear.
Response: When you add harm to a being with the attached gear, exhaust that being, and attach this card to it.
The attached being gains the flora trait.

title: Quiet
description: Ambush.
suneffect: If there is another active predator, Quiet defends her hunting ground. >> Add 3 harm to that predator and 1 harm to this being.
cresteffect: Suffer 1 injury.

title: Quisi Vos, Rascal
description:
Fatiguing. Friendly. Persistent.
FOC + Connection: Ask Quisi about her adventures in the Valley to add progress to this being equal to your effort. Then exhaust this being. Read 80.4
Clear progress or harm: Read 80
suneffect: Discard either 1 progress or 1 token from a plant, insect, or gear.
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Quisi's Favorite Snack
description: Exhaust (use 1 bite): Choose a Ranger. That Ranger soothes fatigue equal to the number of SPI in their energy pool.

title: Ranger Badge
description:
Attach to your role.
Exhaust (use 1 xp): Ready your role.

title: Ranger Cache
description:
AWA + Exploration: Search [2] the cache for useful gear to move your ranger token to this feature. Then you may search your deck for a gear and equip it. If you fail, move your ranger token to this feature and you may add 1 token to one of your equipped gear.
Clear progress: Each Ranger shuffles 2 cards from their Ranger discard into their deck.

title: Ren Kobo, Merchant
description:
Friendly. Persistent.
Clear progress or harm: Read 83
suneffect: Add 1 progress to the location as Ren shares his usual routes with you.
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Rescue
description:
You’ve found the missing person! Get them back to safety as quickly as possible.
Start of the Day: Read 1.47
The subject of this mission gains Persistent.
When the subject of this mission is cleared, resolve the following effects instead:
Clear harm: They worsen and you are forced to stop for the day. Read 1.48
Clear progress: This being cannot be cleared with progress. Ignore this effect.
objective: Arrive at a Ranger Station: Read 1.46
suneffect: If there is no active predator. >> Search the path deck and discard for the next predator and put it into play.

title: Reverb Locket
description:
When you play this gear, attach a moment to it from your hand.
Exhaust (use 1 echo): Play the attached moment as if it were in your hand. It remains attached to this gear instead of being discarded.

title: Riri the Sparrow Hawk
description:
Friendly. Persistent. Unique.
Exhaust: Add 1 harm to a being within reach.
AWA + Reason: Survey the way ahead to scout path cards equal to your effort, then draw 1 path card.

title: Rod of the Clouds
description:
Conduit. Setup.
Response: Before you draw a challenge card, name a challenge icon; if that icon is on the drawn card, add 1 vision to this conduit.
Exhaust (use X visions): Scout X Ranger cards.

title: Romping Lutrinal
description: Ambush.
suneffect: If there is another Romping Lutrinal in play, it frolicks among the reeds. >> Move it within reach.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator other than a Romping Lutrinal, exhaust it. >> Add harm equal to its presence to this being.
cresteffect: If there are other active Romping Lutrinals, exhaust each of them and this being. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Root Snare
description:
Manifestation.
Attach to a feature, and add 2 progress to it.
Response: When a Ranger performs a test, they may discard 1 or more progress from the attached feature to dodge an equal number of cards in the same area.

title: Rotting Dolewood
description:
Obstacle.
Clear harm: Discard each flora in play. Each Ranger suffers fatigue equal to 2 plus the combined presence of all flora discarded this way.
mountaineffect: Add 1 harm to this feature. If the weather is inclement, increase the number of harm added by 1.

title: Safeguard
description: Response: When a Ranger would suffer an injury or harm would be added to a being, cancel that effect. Suffer 1 injury.

title: Scepter of Harmony
description:
Conduit. Setup.
Response: After you perform a test in which no challenge effects were resolved, add 1 song to this conduit.
Exhaust (use X songs): Add X progress to a being.

title: Search
description:
You are following the trail of a missing local.
If your current lcoation is not a Ranger Station, when a feature comes into play, place 2 trail tokens on it.
When a card with trail tokens on it is cleared, place those tokens on this card.
objective: Have 4R or more trail tokens on this mission: Read 1.45
suneffect: They must have come this way. Move 1 trail token from a feature to another feature.
mountaineffect: The trail grows cold. Remove 1 trail token from a feature.
cresteffect: The urgency of the task weighs on you. Suffer 1 fatigue.

title: Secret Garden
description:
Attach to a feature.
Attached feature gains the flora trait.

title: Seen Through Cycles
description:
Manifestation. (To play a manifestation, discard 1 token from a conduit.)
Choose a being in play, and shuffle it into the path deck. Then search the path deck and discard for a being and put it into play.

title: Shale Scree
description:
Obstacle.
AWA + Exploration: Scramble [2] up the slope of shifting rocks to add 3 progress to this feature for every 2 effort. If you fail, resolve its mountain challenge effect.
mountaineffect: Move this card within reach. >> It fatigues you. Move each being that is within reach to another area.
cresteffect: If this feature is within reach, shuffle it into the path deck. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Shape the Earth
description:
Manifestation. (To play a manifestation, discard 1 token from a conduit.)
Add 1 progress to each feature and location. Then you may redistribute any number of progress between them.

title: Share in the Valley's Secrets
description: Exhaust each obstacle. Suffer fatigue equal to the number of obstacles exhausted this way.

title: Sil Belai, Artist
description:
Friendly.
SPI + Reason: Pose [2] heroically to add 4 progress to this being. If you fail, suffer 1 fatigue as you pull something.
Clear progress or harm: Read 82
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Sil's Sketchbook
description:
Exhaust (use X sketches): Exhaust a path card with presence X.
AWA + Reason: Sketch [X] your subject to choose a path card and add X sketches to this book. X is equal to that card’s presence.

title: Sitka Buck
suneffect: If there is another active Sitka Buck, exhaust this being. >> Add 2 harm to both this and the other Sitka Buck.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add 2 harm to it, then add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.
cresteffect: If there is an active Sitka Doe, the buck charges. >> Suffer 1 injury.

title: Sitka Doe
description: SPI + Conflict: Shoo away the skittish grazer to move this being.
suneffect: If there are 1 or more Sitka Bucks in play, they’re drawn to the doe. >> Move each Sitka Buck within reach.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Sky Whip
description:
Manifestation. (To play a manifestation, discard 1 token from a conduit.)
AWA + Conflict: Strike with a whirling coil of wind and water to add harm to a being equal to your effort. Then exhaust that being.

title: Spiderline Stanchion
description:
During your turn, if your ranger token is on this feature, you may treat obstacles as if they did not have the obstacle keyword.
SPI + Reason: Brace [3] yourself for the ride to move your ranger token to this feature.
Response: When you travel, if all ranger tokens are on this feature, you may travel to a location up to 2 paths away. Use the terrain of the second path when building the path deck.

title: Spiderpad Gloves
description:
During your turn, you may treat obstacles as if they did not have the obstacle keyword.
FIT + Reason (use 1 charge): Climb the obstructing terrain with the agility of a spider to move your ranger token to an obstacle.

title: Spirit Speaker Nal
description:
Friendly.
FOC + Connection: Share [2] in Nal’s understanding of the universe to add 1 progress to this being for every 2 effort and scout 1 challenge card.
Clear progress or harm: Read 45
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Staff of the Wanderer
description:
Conduit. Setup.
Response: After you succeed at a Traverse test, add 1 stride to this conduit.
Exhaust (use X strides): Add X progress to a trail.

title: Static Sifter
description:
Response: After you add 1 or more harm to a flora, you may add 1 vittle to this gear.
Exhaust (use 1 vittle): Choose a Ranger. That Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.

title: Stave of the Sun
description:
Conduit. Setup.
Response: After the challenge deck is shuffled, add 1 glint to this conduit.
Exhaust (use X glints): Scout X path cards.

title: Strider
description: You can only commit this attribute when interacting with a trail.

title: Sunberry Bramble
description: AWA + Reason: Pluck [2] the thorn-ringed fruit to add 1 harm to this feature and soothe 2 fatigue. If you fail, this feature fatigues you.
mountaineffect: If there is an active prey, exhaust it. >> Add progress to it and harm to this feature, both equal to that prey’s presence.

title: Surveyed Land
description:
Attach to a feature.
Reduce the attached feature’s presence by 1 for each marker on this attachment.

title: The Bubble
description:
FIT + Exploration: Swim [3] down to the underwater dome to return all of your equipped gear to your hand and move your ranger token to this feature. If you fail, suffer 1 injury.
While your ranger token is on this card, prevent all fatigue you would suffer from the weather.
Clear progress: Read 50

title: The Deep Woods
description:
AWA + Exploration: Hide in the dense undergrowth to move your ranger token to this feature.
While your ranger token is on this feature, you can use the following response:
Response: When a being fatigues you, you may add any number of harm to this feature to prevent an equal amount of fatigue.
mountaineffect: Exhaust this feature. >> Search the path deck for the next predator and put it into play.

title: The Mother of Invention
description: Choose an attachment in a Ranger’s discard. That Ranger may immediately play that attachment as if it were in their hand.

title: The Right Tool
description: Choose a Ranger. That Ranger may discard one of their equipped gear to search their Ranger deck for a gear and equip it without paying its energy cost.

title: Thoroughly Prepared
description: Response: When a Ranger would suffer 1 or more fatigue, they soothe that amount of fatigue instead.

title: Thoughtful
description: You may commit this attribute to any Ranger’s test.

title: Throng of Life
description:
Manifestation. (To play a manifestation, discard 1 token from a conduit.)
Response: When a Ranger draws a challenge card during a test, choose which modifier to use from that card. Then choose an additional challenge icon to resolve for this test.

title: Tidewater Muckets
description: FIT + Reason: Pry open a shell and savor its contents to add 1 harm to this being and soothe 2 fatigue.
suneffect: If there is an exhausted predator, ready it. >> Exhaust this being.
mountaineffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Topside Mast
description:
If the weather is inclement, you cannot interact with this feature.
FOC + Connection: Convince [3] the Swift’s crew of the urgency of your mission to move your ranger token to this feature.
Clear progress: Read 42

title: Tracked
description:
Attach to a being.
Response: After a challenge effect on the attached being resolves, add 1 track.
Use 1 track: When a Ranger performs a test, commit 1 effort.

title: Trail Markers
description:
Attach to a location or feature.
The attached card gains the trail trait.
Response: When 1 or more progress is added to the attached trail, increase the number of progress added by 1.

title: Trail Mix
description: Exhaust (use 1 morsel): Choose a Ranger. That Ranger soothes fatigue equal to the number of FIT in their energy pool.

title: Tranquilisnare
description:
Attach to a being.
Reduce the attached being’s presence by 1 for each snare on this attachment.

title: Translocator
description: Exhaust (use 1 shift): When you perform a test, dodge each card in play. If you fail that test, suffer 1 injury.

title: Tributary Stream
description:
Obstacle.
SPI + Connection: Soak [2] your feet in the cold, clear water to move your ranger token to this feature and soothe fatigue equal to your effort.
FOC + Exploration: Follow [2] the cheerily winding stream to move your ranger token to this feature and add 1 progress to the location.

title: Undaunted Seeker
description: Exhaust: When you perform a test, dodge 1 card.

title: Universal Power Cells
description:
Attach to a Ranger’s equipped tech.
When you play this attachment, add 3 tokens to the attached gear.
Response: When this card becomes unattached, discard 3 tokens from the attached gear.

title: Versatile
description: Before you commit this attribute, you may suffer 1 fatigue. If you do, this attribute gains Reason, Exploration, Conflict.

title: Vigilant
description: The number of Conflict on this attribute is equal to the number of AWA in your energy pool.

title: Vira, Lake Guide
description:
Friendly.
SPI + Connection: Ask [3] for guidance to discard a water obstacle and add 3 progress to Vira.
Clear progress or harm: Read 49
cresteffect: If there is an active predator, exhaust it. >> Add harm to this being equal to that predator’s presence.

title: Voice of the Elders
description: Exhaust: Spend 1 energy to add 1 token to an aid card.

title: Walk With Me
description: Response: After you succeed at a Traverse test, add progress to a being equal to your effort. This is in addition to the test’s standard effect.

title: What Should Never Be
description:
Manifestation.
Response: When drawing challenge cards during a test, draw and discard challenge cards until you draw one with a +1 in the used aspect. Use that challenge card for this test, and suffer fatigue equal the number of cards discarded this way.

title: White Sky
description: AWA + Connection: Search the shores beside the towering parasols of White Sky to scout path cards equal to your effort, then draw 1 path card.

title: Wrist-mounted Darter
description: FOC + Conflict (use 1 dart): Shoot one of the featherlight darts to add harm to a being equal to your effort. Whether you succeed or fail, dodge all cards between you and that being.
